title: No Longer Available - 1888 Scrapps - F. Dunlap and C.W. Bennett

posts.post_title: No Longer Available - 1888 Scrapps - F. Dunlap and C.W. Bennett
posts.post_content:
For sale are two low grade 1888 Scrapps - F. Dunlap & C.W. Bennett 

These are 100% original, guaranteed! 

If they don't pass authentication from one of the major grading companies, return them and I'll refund twice your purchase price! 

Payment by cash, check, MO, or paypal to: [url]KansasBaseball1957@yahoo.com[/url] 

$XX delivered for the pair (I will ship outside the US for actual shipping costs).
